title: Urgently need the pip installation package with ubuntu14/04/05 & cuda8 & cudnn5(bithpy27 an py34))
body_html:
In some country , it cannot download some package like bazel or protobuff etc, so install from source is impossible.

Environment info

Operating System:
ubuntu14/04/05

Installed version of CUDA and cuDNN:
cuda8 & cudnn5

body:
In some country , it cannot download some package like bazel or protobuff etc, so install from source is impossible.
### Environment info

Operating System:
ubuntu14/04/05

Installed version of CUDA and cuDNN: 
cuda8 & cudnn5
